title: Can i get Old client back?
body:
In last champ select I minimized client and thought it will pop up automatically when its my turn to pick .. but it didnt ..also its so slow eg.. i dont even get time to declare champ its keep showing " connecting ..." for long .

i was just wondering if i get back old client? Because i just saw ppl streaming in old client

replies.body:
You certainly can! All you need to do is hit the *launch legacy client* button at the login screen in the new client, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this helped!
